meanings.sent1: The teacher extolled the student for her hard work.
meanings.sent2: The community extolled the hero for his bravery.
meanings.sent3: The cat extolled the deliciousness of the tuna treat.
meanings.sent4: The artist extolled the beauty of nature in her painting.
meanings.sent5: The children extolled the fun they had at the playground.

meanings.sent1: The fans extolled the singer's amazing performance.
meanings.sent2: The critics extolled the film for its originality.
meanings.sent3: The dog extolled the joy of chasing squirrels in the park.
meanings.sent4: The writer extolled the power of words in her novel.
meanings.sent5: The students extolled the benefits of studying together.
